about_the_game: Taking on the role of Dune the bounty hunter, the player is tasked with hunting and eliminating the toughest and most dangerous creatures of the desert. Their vehicle is nowhere near equipped for this job however, and so they must build up their ride using money acquired from collecting other highly sort after items such as rare artefacts, energised crystals, and raptor claws. The mechanic will reward the player handsomely for these, allowing the player to purchase upgrades to their vehicle such as the drill, automatic rifles, and eventually a grenade launcher. The player will need to make the most of all these tools if they're going to stay alive, only being able to spend a certain amount of time out in the desert before the storm begins to rip the flesh from their bones.
detailed_description: Taking on the role of Dune the bounty hunter, the player is tasked with hunting and eliminating the toughest and most dangerous creatures of the desert. Their vehicle is nowhere near equipped for this job however, and so they must build up their ride using money acquired from collecting other highly sort after items such as rare artefacts, energised crystals, and raptor claws. The mechanic will reward the player handsomely for these, allowing the player to purchase upgrades to their vehicle such as the drill, automatic rifles, and eventually a grenade launcher. The player will need to make the most of all these tools if they're going to stay alive, only being able to spend a certain amount of time out in the desert before the storm begins to rip the flesh from their bones.
name: Dune of the Desert

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7 (SP1+) and Windows 10, 64-bit versions only.
  • Processor: X64 architecture with SSE2 instruction set support
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DX10, DX11, and DX12-capable GPUs
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

short_description: A vehicular-combat focused game set in a post apocalyptic desert, the player takes the role of a bounty hunter tasked with taking down some of the most feared creatures in the desert. Collect artefacts, crystals, and other highly sort after items to upgrade your vehicle for high intensity combat.
